message.content:
I need to identify the net cash flow from operating activities and its component sub-items from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see the main item is "Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities" with a value of -650630.22. 

The 7 component sub-items that make up this amount are:
1. Net Profit: 905750.76
2. Depreciation: 91509.25
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -2149792.45
4. (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable: -14575.80
5. (Increase) Decrease in Inventory: -112000.00
6. Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 485000.00
7. Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable: 143478.02

I can verify this is correct by adding all the sub-items:
905750.76 + 91509.25 + (-2149792.45) + (-14575.80) + (-112000.00) + 485000.00 + 143478.02 = -650630.22

So the answer is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-650630.22', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '905750.76', 'sub_item value2': '91509.25', 'sub_item value3': '-2149792.45', 'sub_item value4': '-14575.80', 'sub_item value5': '-112000.00', 'sub_item value6': '485000.00', 'sub_item value7': '143478.02'}}}
```
